question_title: What will be the value of "NASDAQ 100 Index" on 2026-02-12?
summary: Forecasting NASDAQ 100 for Feb 12, 2026 (8 trading days out). Current value ~25,741. Using VXN-implied volatility of ~22% annualized (3.9% 8-day volatility). Key catalysts include Alphabet earnings (Feb 4) and Amazon earnings (Feb 5), both major index components. Government shutdown and Fed uncertainty add modest risk. Distribution centered near current level with appropriate volatility bands. Model verified via Monte Carlo simulation with fat-tail adjustment.

factors.description: VXN at 19.5% implies ~4% 8-day volatility, giving reasonable confidence in distribution width
Short time horizon (8 trading days) limits magnitude of likely moves
Amazon earnings Feb 5 with implied move of ±6.4% - major uncertainty
Alphabet earnings Feb 4 - analyst expectations positive, could boost index
Recent DeepSeek AI concerns created tech sector volatility
Government shutdown affecting economic data releases
Historical NASDAQ drift ~10% annually = +0.3% over 8 days
